WorkItem.Description:
I am running Rawr3 in mac os 10.6.
When I have enforce gem requirements checked, the 264 t10 shoulders (no other shoulders that I've noticed) only display with blue gems. I have the meta requirement taken care of on my chestpiece already.
When I uncheck enforce gem requirements, non-blue gem setups appear in addition to the blue ones.
I saw something vaguely similar that was posted previously, also in enhancement, but it seems to have been closed. Sorry if this is redundant.
xml file attached.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] T10 264 Shoulders Only Socketing Blue Gems

Comments.Message: Doubt its an enhance only issue. The enforce gem requirements is a global thing.
This is because of the gemming templates. The gemming templates that are deployed in Rawr 3 have only blue gems in blue slots in enhance.
